inputs.name: north_
inputs.description:
A number between -360 and 360 for the counterclockwise
difference between the North and the positive Y-axis in degrees.
90 is West and 270 is East. This can also be Vector for the
direction to North. (Default: 0)

inputs.name: _location
inputs.description:
A ladybug Location that has been output from the "LB Import EPW"
component or the "LB Construct Location" component.

inputs.name: _run
inputs.description: Set to True to run the component set the Rhino Sun.

name: LB Set Rhino Sun
description:
Set the sun in the Rhino scene to correspond to a given location and date/time.
_
This can be help coordinate Rhino visualizations with Ladybug analyses.
